review: I had feeding issues to my 2 month old ..earlier I consulted 3 docs but in vain....finally when i consulted dr zinal...even before i could explain my problem....she understood it...she explained me d root cause nd d solution in a very friendly way... I was totally comtented by her ....and could see improvement within a week....my teratment is still going on but I cannot trust anyone else for dis....she just takes away all ur worries by smiling and giving u confidence dat u will be fine soon....i highly recommend her for all d mothers ....

We visited her for our feeding related issue and ended up choosing her to be our pead as well. She was quick to diagnose the issue and guide us to the next course of action! She is very friendly and assures you with her warm smile and immense knowledge. Always there to answer our tiney tiney query!

Highly recommended! Glad to have found her :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had consulted her for my baby's feeding related issue. She gave a perfect detailed explanation and made me feel so confident about bf. She is always smiling and it gives you a feel good factor when u visit the clinic. I would surely recommend her for any baby related issues. I'm glad i found her :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Zinal is good person and explaining the dieses of my baby boy.. 5/5. Highly recommended.........
being a new mother i was paranoid about my baby's health,Dr zinal is a good listener and counsels parents with patience . would surely recommend her ,she sticks to treating naturally for the newborn.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Zinal is wonderful and caring doctor. She is always friendly and comforting. She makes you understand the treatment really well. I have great confidence in her. Lucky to have a her as my kids pediatrician!!

Very experienced Doctor, thorough check up and explanation about child. Answered every query.

Thank you So much.
